tasks.title: Set up monorepo structure
tasks.description: Scaffold the top-level monorepo with shared tooling, lint, and CI pipeline. Use Turborepo for task orchestration.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
- `pnpm install` succeeds from root
- `pnpm lint` runs across all packages
- CI pipeline passes on first push
tasks.notes: Reference: internal ADR-002 for tooling choices.

tasks.title: Implement Speckit JSON parser
tasks.description: Build the parser that reads a Speckit export and validates its schema before conversion.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
- Rejects files missing `tasks` array with a clear error
- Handles tasks with no optional fields gracefully
- Unit tests for all priority/status/type mappings

tasks.title: Design Bead file schema
tasks.description: Define the canonical JSON schema for a Bead file including all required fields, optional fields, and metadata envelope.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
- JSON Schema document committed to repo
- All field names match `steveyegge/beads` `types.Issue` conventions
- `external_id` field is documented as the stable cross-system identity
tasks.notes: Use `external_ref` and `source_system` from the upstream Beads model.

tasks.title: Implement GitHub Issues sync
tasks.description: Write the `beads-to-gh` and `sync` commands that push Bead files to GitHub Issues via the `gh` CLI.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
- Creates new issues with title, body, labels, assignee
- Updates existing issues detected by the `<!-- beadsync:external_id -->` anchor
- Stores GitHub issue number/URL back into the Bead's metadata
- Re-running the command is idempotent (no duplicate issues created)
tasks.notes: Must not override manual GitHub edits unless `--force` is passed.

tasks.title: CLI dry-run and status commands
tasks.description: Add `--dry-run` support to all write commands and a `status` subcommand that reports each Bead's sync state without modifying anything.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
- `--dry-run` prints what would happen without making changes
- `beadsync status ./beads` prints a table of all beads with GitHub issue numbers and sync state
- Exit code 0 even when issues need syncing

tasks.title: Write end-to-end integration test
tasks.description: Run the full pipeline: Speckit export → Beads → GitHub against a test repo using `gh` and assert that issues exist with correct content.
tasks.acceptance_criteria:
- Pipeline succeeds against `beadsync-test` GitHub repo
- Re-running does not create duplicate issues
- A forced update changes the issue body
tasks.notes: Create a dedicated `beadsync-test` repo under the org for this.
